name: Heartguy Pepe
description:
Heartguy Pepe game made for the Wowie Jam 3.0 !!

this is my first ever (finished, sort of) game :) i have never participated in a game jam before and i don't know how to properly scope games. 

the jams theme was "Failure is Progress" and the game is not related to the subject (at all). my view was "i'm doing this for the first time... i think that counts as progress". i didn't really know how i would approach the design itself... it just came along. i wanted to do a lot of things but then realized i can't even do one. so in fact the game itself is a failure, but aswell a progress for me :)

it includes: 

  • a bunch of bugs
  • music that doesn't repeat
  • sounds that play more than once at the same time
  • ~5 minutes of heartguy pepe

it has 3 levels and i made it in a rush so... some things need to be changed and the last level door doesn't go anywhere... but it's there :)

hope you like it!!

assets used:

pixel art clouds by sam https://s4m-ur4i.itch.io/pixelart-clouds-background,

chiptone by sfbgames https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone,

music loop bundle by tallbeard studios https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle,

all art and animations (except background) made by me :)
